homeEN.resume: Hello, my name is Lucas Custódio Viscaino, I was born on October 9, 2001 in Sorocaba - SP, and I am currently
homeEN.resumeII: My first contact with technology was very early on, when I got my first video game the PS2, since then I've been passionate about how things work, and this passion brought me to the world of development where I started my career as a developer.
homeEN.resumeIII:
Already I had experiences with Node, React, Flutter, React Native, Jquery but without a doubt React has a special place in my heart ♥.
Despite being very tech savvy I also love outdoor activities like camping, hiking, swimming, playing soccer and much more. I also really like watching thriller movies in general, I'm fascinated by captivating movies that hold you captiveuntil the last second and often has an unexpected twist at the end.
homeEN.resumeIV: Well that was a brief summary about me, thanks for reading this far =).
